title: Spacious Upgraded Ground-Level Two Bed + One Bath in NoHo Arts!
posting_body: ['A two-story building with fountain courtyard, a gated entrance, a phone-intercom access, a swimming pool, a gated-and-assigned parking, and on-site laundry in North Hollywood.', 'Only a few blocks away from the New No-Ho Arts District with convenient access to the 134, the 101 and the 170 freeways.', 'Metro rails are also easily accessible; metro rails like the Orange Line for access through the San Fernando Valley and the Red Line for access through Hollywood, Downtown Los Angeles, and Universal Studios.', 'For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact our Property Manager, Angelica at', 'show contact info', '.', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: Two', 'Bathrooms: One', 'Parking:', 'One Space', 'Lease Duration:', 'One Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit: One month (OAC)', 'Pets Policy: Dogs & Cats OK', 'Laundry: Shared', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'UNIT DESCRIPTION', 'The living room is newly painted and has wood floors throughout.', "There is a coat closet, a wall air conditioning unit, a wall heater, a new light fixture on a dimmer, and two sliding glass doors for access to the unit's private floor patio.", 'The dining space is large enough for a four-chair dining table.', 'It also has tile flooring, a ceiling fan with a light fixture, and a window with new wooden horizontal blinds.', 'The kitchen has white tile countertops, a double stainless-steel sink with a tall spout faucet, a lot of cabinets and a window with new horizontal blinds.', 'There are also stainless-steel appliances like a dishwasher, a gas stove-oven, and an over-the-range microwave.', 'The primary bedroom with a wall air conditioning unit, a large window with new horizontal wooden blinds, a ceiling fan with a light fixture on a dual-dimmer switch, a USB outlet / port (for convenient charging), and a spacious closet with mirrored sliding doors.', 'The second bedroom with a wall air conditioning unit, a large window with new horizontal wooden blinds, a ceiling fan with a light fixture on a dual dimmer, a USB outlet / port, and a closet with mirrored sliding doors.', 'The bathroom has a vanity, a large custom mirror and light sconce above, a new mirrored medicine cabinet, a bathtub with tiled walls, ceiling exhaust / heater fan, a window, and all new accessories.', '*This unit comes with one dedicated parking space', '*This is a ground-floor unit', 'For additional Ben Leeds Property listings go to <URL> or call our Leasing Agent', 'show contact info', '.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat and Dogs friendly – under 25 lbs.', '(weight at maturity); No aggressive breeds: Chows, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, Rottweilers, German Shepard, and a mix of aggressive breeds.', 'Pet Rent and Deposit may apply.', 'Other Terms and Requirements:', '1-year lease term; Security deposit is determined by your credit, typically 1-month rent; Online Application is preferred and can be processed faster than a paper application; $30 Application fee per person (18 years and older) can be paid with credit or debit card for online application or with money order and cashier check for paper application;', 'No evictions; No foreclosures / bankruptcies in the last 5 years; Two (2) forms of current government issued ID: Driver’s License, Passport, SSN card, Military ID, Visa, etc., Proof of Income: last 3 months of check stub’s, or checking / saving account, or current W2.', 'Renter’s insurance is required.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity Provider', '*Pricing and availability is subject to change without notice*', 'Photos may vary from actual unit and are for representational purposes only and subject to variances.', 'Variances may include, but are not limited to, views and exposure to light, finishes for the final product, as well as layout and included features in the finished product.']
